entry.title: Jian LIU
entry.content:
About me

I am a postgraduate student in Geography. I received my master degree in Human Geography from Capital Normal University, China in 2022. Now, I am working as a research assistant in the GeoX lab lead by Dr. Xintao Liu! My research interest focuses on human behaviors, urban dynamics, and complex networks. Leveraging big data and advanced technologies, my research aims to reveal human mobility and urban dynamics in cities for a smarter resident life and urban development.

Education

  • 2022.11~: Research Assistant
    Department of Land Surveying and Geo-Informatics, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

  • 2019.9~2022.06: MSc in Human Geography
    College of Resource Environment and Tourism, Capital Normal University

  • 2015.9~2019.06: BSc in Human Geography and Urban-rural Planning
    College of Geography and Environmental Science, Northwest Normal University

Research interests

  • Travel behaviors and activity space
  • Urban structure and dynamics
  • Urban big data analytics and applications
  • Goal: revealing human mobility and urban dynamics in cities for a smarter resident life and urban development.
